com.cloudpos.signature

Interface SignatureDevice

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Device

    public interface SignatureDevice
extends Device
    The SignatureDevice interface defines the signature APIs to be used by the applications.

    The signature device object is obtained from the POSTerminal, its' as follows: 

     SignatureDevice signatureDevice =
         (SignatureDevice) POSTerminal.getInstance().getDevice("cloudpos.device.signature");
    Among them, the "cloudpos.device.signature" string is to identify the signature device, defined by the specific implementation.

    Uses the signature device object to control the operation of the signature device.

    An app can request permission to access the device, as shown below: 

     <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.CLOUDPOS_SIGNATURE"/>
    See Also:
    Device

      • open

        void open(int logicID)
          throws DeviceException
        Opens the device.
        Parameters:
        logicID - logical ID of the device to open.
        Throws:
        DeviceException - for the standard reasons that are documented in DeviceException.

      • listenSignature

        void listenSignature(java.lang.String transactionCode,
                   OperationListener listener,
                   int timeout)
                     throws DeviceException
        Listens until write the signature in this terminal. A callback will be called after write signature or timeout.

        This is an asynchronous method. handleResult() will be invoked when at least one card has been detected in the field.

        Because this method uses a timeout parameter, the device receiving this request MUST be able to successfully respond to cancelRequest() and abort the operation.

        In case of a timeout occurring, the operation result will contain code= ERR_TIMEOUT, and no information about card will be available.

        Parameters:
        transactionCode - a transaction code.
        timeout - the maximum scanning time of the method, in milliseconds.
        Throws:
        DeviceException - for the standard reasons that are documented in DeviceException
        See Also:
        OperationListener.handleResult(com.cloudpos.OperationResult)

      • waitSignature

        SignatureOperationResult waitSignature(java.lang.String transactionCode,
                                     int timeout)
                                       throws DeviceException
        This is the synchronous method of the listenSignature(String,OperationListener,int).
        Parameters:
        transactionCode - a transaction code.
        timeout - the maximum scanning time of the method, in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        the signature result.
        Throws:
        DeviceException - for the standard reasons that are documented in DeviceException
